data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is an attempt to solve most common problems occurred in
    Traditional vs. Simplified Chinese conversion, in an efficient,
    flexible way, without resorting to external tools or modules.

    It is currently heavily used in Chinese language-related projects
    (e.g. OpenWebMail project) to provide an appropriately localized
    interface for both Simplified and Traditional Chinese users.
